ssl_certificate_error.title: SSL Certificate Error
ssl_certificate_error.description:
Failed to connect to Mitsubishi Owner Portal due to an SSL certificate error.

**URL:** {url}

**Error:** {error}

**Possible causes:**
1. The server's SSL certificate has expired
2. Your system's CA certificates need updating
3. Network connectivity issues

**Solutions:**
- Wait for Mitsubishi to fix the certificate (if it's expired on their end)
- Update your system's CA certificates
- Check your network connection and firewall settings
- Contact Mitsubishi technical support if the issue persists
